metadata.synopsis: Salazon is preparing a fire-trap at the entrance to his gang's hideout. We can either sneak up on him or be sneaked up on in turn - either way we have to convince him we should be there or he'll get skittish and blow us all up. In general he's jumpy and suspicious of us, but relieved when we convince him we're a friend. Think an inexperienced guard pointing a gun at us when he's been told to be on alert.

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *You spot a man crouching between the shelves - just as he spots you.*
36.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behind the shelves].

66.speaker: Salazon
66.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching] Salazon readies fire bolt spell. Surprised, barely suppressed panic

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Recite Rugan's pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.

30.speaker: Salazon
30.text: Gah, Helm's orbs. Thought you were Flaming Fist.
30.context: NodeContext: Salazon stands up (relieved), he cancels his fire bolt spell. He goes from jumpy to relieved - we know the pass phrase so he won't have to get in a fight

2.speaker: Salazon
2.text: Down you go, then. They'll be on us soon, so if you're looking to trade you'd best be quick.
2.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is standing up.] He's gone from panicked guard to faux-authority very quickly, as if he's chiding us for having spooked him

54.speaker: Salazon
54.text: Entrance is hidden behind the wardrobe - here's the key.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wardrobe is behind SalazonNodeContext: [Salazon is standing up] He casually chucks the player a key.

0.speaker: Salazon
0.text: Entrance is hidden behind the wardrobe. You'll find a key in one of the crates.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wardrobe is behind SalazonNodeContext: [Salazon is standing up.] Already dismissing us from his mind.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I'm with Zarys - do not cast that spell.

42.speaker: Narrator
42.text: *He freezes, waiting on your next word.*

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Careful. You won't kill me, but you will make me mad.

13.speaker: Salazon
13.text: Right, look - if it's business you're about, then be about it. Flaming Fist could be on us any minute.
13.context: NodeContext: Salazon stands up. We've intimidated him but he's trying to cling on to some scrap of authority, letting us down with a warning as if it's his choice.

43.speaker: Salazon
43.text: Down you go - entrance is behind the wardrobe. Here's the key.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wardrobe is behind SalazonNodeContext: [Salazon is standing up] He casually chucks the player a key.

65.speaker: Salazon
65.text: Down you go - entrance is behind the wardrobe. You'll find a key in one of the crates.
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wardrobe is behind SalazonNodeContext: [Salazon is standing].

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Just calm down - I'm not here to fight.

70.speaker: Salazon
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fire bolt is still in hand.NodeContext: Salazon gets up frantically as he exclaims his line.

6.speaker: Salazon
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fire bolt is still in hand.NodeContext: Salazon gets up frantically as he exclaims his line.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: This is all pretty crude, as traps go - you'll probably kill us both.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I am magic. Cast that spell - you'll only hurt yourself.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Fire is in my blood. Do it. Let's see who survives.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Every spell I cast could be my last. You think I fear death?

79.speaker: Player
79.text: That spell, in close quarters? You're going to hurt yourself.

57.speaker: Salazon
57.text: ... let's say I'd rather not fight, then. What's your business down here?
57.context: NodeContext: Salazon stands up. Frightened and pretending not to be, hearing us out. He doesn't want to fight really.

71.speaker: Salazon
71.text: Your timing ain't the best, but I'm sure Zarys won't turn down a deal. Down you go, then.
71.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is standing]. Considering us, weighing his options - Zarys is someone he is afraid of, but he also doesn't want to fight us.

39.speaker: Salazon
39.text: One of our own, eh? All right, down you go.
39.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is standing]. Realising we're from a similar criminal organisation - trusting us slightly more, but only about as much as one thief ever trusts another

76.speaker: Salazon
76.text: 'Little serpent, long shadow.' Don't want to die. 'Little serpent, long shadow.' Just say it!
76.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behinnd the shelves with Fire Bolt ready]. Frantically repeating this over and over in his mind - it's a pass phrase he is repeating in his head, willing us to say it so he doesn't have ot fight

53.speaker: Player
53.text: I know the pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.

23.speaker: Salazon
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fire bolt is still in hand.NodeContext: We've said the wrong thing, and now he's panicking and setting off a detonation

5.speaker: Salazon
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fire bolt is still in hand.NodeContext: Calling to his boss for protection like a child

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *A human man awaits you, a spell crackling at his fingertips.*
44.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behind the shelves with Fire Bolt ready].

10.speaker: Player
10.text: Recite Rugan's pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *You spot a man crouching between the shelves - just as he spots you.*
67.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behind the shelves].

81.speaker: Narrator
81.text: *A human man awaits you, a spell crackling at his fingertips.*
81.context: NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behind the shelves with Fire Bolt ready].
